PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-14042011-12-01TC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Marine Act
Subject** LETTERS PATENT ** Sept-Îles Port Authority
PrecisOrder approving SUPPLEMENTARY LETTERS PATENT, amending Article 9 of the letters patent issued to the SEPT-ÎLES PORT AUTHORITY, in order to increase the borrowing limit which will provide greater financial flexibility and facilitate the undertaking of essential capital projects at the port.
AttachmentsAttachment
